When you get a tan, what is actually happening is that the melanocytes are producing melanin pigment in reaction to ultraviolet light in sunlight. Ultraviolet light stimulates melanin production. The pigment has the effect of absorbing the UV radiation in sunlight, so it protects the cells from UV damage. Melanin production takes a fair amount of time - that is why most people cannot get a tan in one day. You have to expose yourself to UV for a short period of time to activate the melanocytes. They produce melanin over the course of hours. By repeating this process over 5 to 7 days pigment builds up in your cells to a level that is protective. The previous paragraph applies to Caucasians. In a variety of other races melanin production is continuous, so the skin is always pigmented to some degree. In these races the incidence of skin cancer is much lower because cells are constantly protected from UV radiation by melanin. Melanocytes actually produce two different pigments: eumelanin (brown) and phaeomelanin (yellow and red). Red heads happen to produce more phaeomelanin and less eumelanin, which is why they don't tan very well. Melanocyte-stimulating hormone (MSH) is produced by the pituitary gland. MSH flows through the bloodstream and reaches the melanocytes, encouraging them to produce more melanin (for example, a person injected with a large dose of MSH will get darker). The pituitary gland is actually quite interesting - it is tied into the optic nerve, which means that it can sense light.

todays youth is becoming more and more passive. take the aim profile for example. what one does not have the nerve to address, one publishes in one's profile. i mean really dudes, how much more passive can you get? today us youths are being sucked into the black hole of passivity. so you write things in youre profile, or youre xangas knowing that ppl will read it and approach you about the subject at hand...geez, first our generation is blessed with the age of technology which, i might add, has produced a generation of LAZYASSES! ( and yes, i am one of them )...sad aint it? so not only has technology aided in the evolution of a new generation of lethargic tech freaks, it has breeded in us a sense of passivity that, like cancer, slowly deteriorates the essence of human interaction. goddamn. so to this i say cheers to my botch who i owe this enlightenment to. bc i am a member of generation passive lazyass. but i must do as i preach and "grow some damn balls!" or boobs in my case. passivity is no longer an option for me! the lethargy, im workin on that. but passivity, youre ass is mine! and THAT is what i thought about int he shower today. yay for the happy place!

urlLink so the best part of my junior year? my pool buddies. i am a proud member of the lesbian lover of swimmer chicks cult. uh HUH! and i claim presidency as the cult leader of bootyflyers! swimming was the best...just ....stress relief....and good people...the best

urlLink so junior year sucked, i mean.......no...really...it sucked. there were a couple of LIFESAVING highlights though...like polo and swimming, but we shall get into that later....first!...school life....so yea blah junior year equals lots of APs no life and oh yea drama disasters. my good buddy vivian knows all about the functions of the identity property and synnes and fobio times...man that was ages ago! but why does it still hautn me from timeto time?! ghhhh! there no escape! hey viv, lets burn all the stuff and have like a cult thing...i deno...it was on friends once....and then they met HOT FIREMEN! hahaha hotdamn i get sidetracked easily what the hell was i talking about? ah yes, junior year....see i have ADHD and i blame my crapass grades on that! but no really, im ill with procrastination cancer...well me wont dwell on THAT...just that MY identity property crumbled...and well just as ive said once before ( am i being REDUNDANT?! ) we live parallel live, viv and me...mine ( ID property ) crumbled like a distress cookie drowning in milk...and then soon after yours did too...yes it did! dont freaken deny it! but i win, bc i always do...the dot games in guttal...i win bc im better than you bc i know how to put chicks before dicks...even punkass BITCHES before dicks...why the hell did i do that? oh yea...bc im better off now..haha! =D suckas! what else? oh well jason was a cutie pie...hey viv did i ever tell you that synne thought me and jason were gonna hook up! hahaha thats off the heezy odd...its odd like the number 3...but yea he was a ..... talkative person...and then um.....i can shake it off....just a minor brainfart...i know im sposed to be all reminiscing and shtuff but...after graduation, vu said " eh jessica maybe next year ill tap that ass" and i was just walking to my car....and that was outa nowhere....it was odd...like the number 3....but you know what? i love the number 3 bc that was marrissa's number....i think i have to like....reincarnate it...into number 11...bc thats MY number and i aspire to be the next marrissa...ok now where was i? as yes...junior year...so yea, it sucked. =D thats it.

urlLink next year krystal and i reign the stinkers clan...actually spitters...but thent he spitters left...so we really are stinkers now...ah well...were gonna get soffee shorts visors and maybe jackets...yea, were gonna have a pimpass senior year of h20 polo regardless of the fact that we're in division II. thats gaytarded but whatever. 4th waterpolo season 2005 here i come!

urlLink so i started this year with polo...almost didnt join...but sure as hell glad i did bc it was damn GOOD TIMES and fucken awesome memories...the water polo kids are the bestest buncha whackasss farts, and i do mean FARTS, in the world. i will truely miss this seniors...the WHOLE freaken STARTING LINE UP! alison, that chick is ao gnarly. i always thought i was afraid of her, but turns out i was only afraid that shed hate me...i always thought she was so uber cool. and sarah, shes the nicest, my polo support buddy, she saved my ass and i saved hers, man where will i be without her next year?....*sigh* flying SOLO i guess...and then MARRISSA....shes my most bestest sprinter ever, i am so proud and honored to have been her ball back for the entire season....hotdamn...we lost every time, but we made the best of it ( Marrissa:" dont sprint this time!" Me: " ok good") teehee, we werre a couple of nonslackers...yep...polo...was just fucken awesome...3rd in league....kicked MP's ass.....handed ST their pinchin-grabbin-kick-me-in-the-boobs-dirtyass-mofo-wangsta-water-polo asses on a silver platter. yep it was GLORIFYING. hahaha what can i say? after polo season it was time to submerge myself in what i would like to call HELL aka junior year...and so the real trials and tribulations begin... urlLink

so today we had another meet...and next week we have yet ANOTHER meet...but i SWEAR ill swim 3 events next week...i swear!.....well ill try haha....so i guess this meet was like blah except its really really odd that vin's image stayed with me even after i left...and it was odd how i kinda sauntered to my car just so i could walk through the parking lot at the same time he was....yea odd... SO....since we left so damned early..still feel kinda guilty about that....but ah well the girls didnt even show and vin and that whole gang left too so i guess it sort of eases the guilt...but anyways...so me and jon ahd some time to kill....decided to go to michaels and wherever else...well things took a turn for the....wouldnt say worse...but it wasnt all that great either... this will be in a nutshell but reliving it all is kinda tiresome...oh! speaking of tiresome MAN was i groggy today after my nap! and man was i fatigued before my nap! but anyways, back to my misadventure...hah, thats what it was! a misadventure! ok, so back to it... i went on the freeway...anticipated the traffic so instead of taking 101 back to san jose....i went straight to god knows where...i deno the name of the freeway but i was on my way towards valley fair! so i exited on 11th st i think...made my way downtown and decided hey lets go to the library since my brother needed some chem books anyway...so i drove around for a bit bc i didnt really know where the library was...haha everywhere downtown looks kinda the same...anyways i found it...but passed it...so i made a FATTY and i do mean like fatbastard-tub-of-lard FATTY circle and made my way BACK to the library parking lot which i made some illegal manuver to get to....driving down the wrong way on a ONEWAY street....yes...i am so embarrassed...anyways went in parked and walked to the library only to be TURNED AWAY bc i was closing! my god! all that for NOTHING! geeeez....so we went back and i drove off to michaels where we got the t shirts and then we went home...and oh yea...i almost ran into a bus...what kinda genius puts a bus stop right in front of a parking lot entrance i mean really...am i just being a dimwit or is that an INGENIUS idea?! i mean who woulda thought that a car would turn into the parking lot at the ENTRANCE i mean wow...geeez...so the bus was there loading and unloading passengers and i went around it and was about to turn and the bus moves foward! its like dude...wtf are you doing? i dont really blame the driver but...WHO THE HELL PUTS A BUS STOP RIGHT IN FRONT OF THE ENTRANCE?! i mean geeez man! what kinda idiots run this country? HAH so there you have it my misadventure...bet i scared the shits outa my little brother... and you know, i still cant shake vinh's image from my mind
so i .....wow check out these new colors theyve got on blogspot....gnarly dude
i am so ready for it to be thursday....like so ready
